spout.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: a small pipe on the side of a container that you pour liquid out through
spout.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: if liquid or fire spouts from somewhere, it comes out very quickly in a powerful stream
spout.translation[1].definitions[0].exam: Blood was spouting from the wound in her arm.
spout.translation[1].definitions[1].defi: to send out liquid or flames very quickly in a powerful stream
spout.translation[1].definitions[2].defi: to talk a lot about something in a boring or annoying way
spout.translation[1].definitions[2].exam: My father was spouting his usual nonsense!
I hate it when he spouts off like that!
Iâ€™m tired of listening to Jim spouting about politics.
spout.translation[1].definitions[3].defi: if a whale spouts, it sends out a stream of water from a hole in its head
